title: Fern the red deer
creator_credit: De Lane Lea, Children's Film and Television Foundation, Adrian Worker and Jan Darnley-Smith
brief_description: Fern the red deer A marvellous adventure story, filmed on location in remote Exmoor, about an abandoned deer calf. The deer calf forms a bond with two young children and together they fight for the wild deer’s survival.
creator_credit_for_label: De Lane Lea, Children’s Film and Television Foundation, Adrian Worker and Jan Darnley-Smith
